mapper.select: select m.member_id, m.member_rank_id, m.member_dept_id, m.member_role_id, m.member_pw, m.member_name, m.member_enabled, m.member_regdate, m.member_update_date, c.code_name from members m left join common_code c on m.member_role_id = c.code_id where m.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into members ( member_id, member_rank_id, member_dept_id, member_role_id, member_pw, member_name, member_enabled, member_regdate ) values ( #{memberId}, #{memberRankId}, #{memberDeptId}, #{memberRoleId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberEnabled}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') )
mapper.select: select member_id, member_name, member_dept, code_name AS member_rank from ( select member_id, member_name, member_dept_id, member_rank_id, code_name AS member_dept from members m join common_code cc on cc.code_id = m.member_dept_id) mm join common_code cc on cc.code_id = mm.member_rank_id
select member_id, member_rank_id, member_dept_id, member_role_id, member_pw, member_name, member_enabled, member_regdate from members where member_id = #{memberId}

select m.member_id, m.member_rank_id, m.member_dept_id, m.member_role_id, m.member_pw, m.member_name, m.member_enabled, m.member_regdate, rank.code_name as member_rank, dept.code_name as member_dept, role.code_name as member_role from members m inner join common_code rank on m.member_rank_id = rank.code_id inner join common_code dept on m.member_dept_id = dept.code_id inner join common_code role on m.member_role_id = role.code_id where m.member_enabled = 1
